mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph of the Rockbridge Community Bicentennial Quilt is hampered by a lot of glare which is present in the original. The back of the photograph includes two handwritten notes: "June 1975" and "Bicentennial Quilt of historical landmark in Lexington, VA. #Note Blandome."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bicentennial Quilt (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Blandome (Lexington, Va.)
